page.title: 15FOOD
page.content: For{breakfast}I had Frosties and a cup of tea.For my{dinner}at school I have got two cucumber and salad cream sandwiches,a packet of skips crisp's,a strawberry yoghurt and a spoon to eat it with,as well as a Twix to eat at the end.On the way home I might go in one of the village shops.I might buy a choclate swiss roll and may be two packets of chewing gum to have later on in the evening.I will also buy two Mr Freezes to eat at home.When I get home from school I will have a glass of orange and a Twix.For{tea}I am having a turkey leg roll with roast potatoes and carrots and peas and gravy.I might have 1\ pints of shandy and a Mars Bar and a packet of crisps. For my{supper}I will have a cup of coffee and biscuits. GLENN TURNER. {_____ _______}
